name: Associazione Italiana Chiropratici
goal:
1. The opening of the Italian Register for Chiropractors.
2. Facilitate and mediate the establishment of a University based chiropractic programme in Italy.
3. Promote the science, philosophy and art of chiropractic.
4. Make quality chiropractic care available to a majority of citizens.
5. Promote mobility and pubic health in the EU.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation
euInitiatives:
EU Expert Panel on Investment in Health
Health Programme
EU Platform Nutrition and Physical Activity
JA Chrodis
Directive and Legislation on Recognition of Professional Qualifications
